title: Controversy at Vuelta España Femenina as UCI Inspection Causes Riders to Miss TTT Start Time
content:
Criticism from Ferrand-Prévot following Vuelta chaos: ‘Can’t believe what happened…this is SO amateur’

author: sstokes
